title: entha paapinaithi
sahitya:
enta pApinaiti nEmi sEyuDu hAyElAgu tALudunE O rAma



anupallavi



anta duhkhamulanu dIrcu harini jUci enta vArainanu bAya

sahinturE



caraNam 1



maccikatO dAnu muccatAdi mOsa bucci Eca madi vaccenO kaTakaTA



caraNam 2



Asaminci yayAsa baDanu vidhi vrAsunA nA muddu vEsuni gAnamE



caraNam 3



sEva jEyuTE jIvanamani unTi daivamA nApAli bhAgya miTlAyanE



caraNam 4



rAjillu shrI tyAgarAju tA bongucu pUjincu shrI raghurAjindu

lEnandu
